# 新德汇关系图应用类库

# 安装

npm install xdh-go --save
1

# 全量引入

import XdhGo from 'xdh-go'
import Vue from 'vue'
import 'xdh-go/lib/xdhgo.css'
Vue.use(XdhGo)
1
2
3
4
5

# 按需引入

import 'xdh-go/lib/xdhgo.css'
import {XdhGo, XdhGoTooltip} from 'xdh-go'
1
2
3
